verses.text_plain: And the child Samuel ministered unto the Lord before Eli. And the word of the Lord was precious in those days; there was no open vision.
verses.verse_html: 1And the child Samuel ministered unto the Lord before Eli. And the word of the Lord was precious in those days; there was no open vision.

verses.text_plain: And it came to pass at that time, when Eli was laid down in his place, and his eyes began to wax dim, that he could not see;
verses.verse_html: 2And it came to pass at that time, when Eli was laid down in his place, and his eyes began to wax dim, that he could not see;

tokens.text: And it came to pass at that time

verses.text_plain: And ere the lamp of God went out in the temple of the Lord, where the ark of God was, and Samuel was laid down to sleep;
verses.verse_html: 3And ere the lamp of God went out in the temple of the Lord, where the ark of God was, and Samuel was laid down to sleep;

verses.text_plain: That the Lord called Samuel: and he answered, Here am I.
verses.verse_html: 4That the Lord called Samuel: and he answered, Here am I.

verses.text_plain: And he ran unto Eli, and said, Here am I; for thou calledst me. And he said, I called not; lie down again. And he went and lay down.
verses.verse_html: 5And he ran unto Eli, and said, Here am I; for thou calledst me. And he said, I called not; lie down again. And he went and lay down.

verses.text_plain: And the Lord called yet again, Samuel. And Samuel arose and went to Eli, and said, Here am I; for thou didst call me. And he answered, I called not, my son; lie down again.
verses.verse_html: 6And the Lord called yet again, Samuel. And Samuel arose and went to Eli, and said, Here am I; for thou didst call me. And he answered, I called not, my son; lie down again.

verses.text_plain: Now Samuel did not yet know the Lord, neither was the word of the Lord yet revealed unto him.
verses.verse_html:
7Now Samuel did not yet know the Lord, neither was the word of the Lord yet revealed unto him.
 Now: or, Thus did Samuel before he knew the Lord, and before the word of the Lord was revealed unto him

footnotes.body_text: Now: or, Thus did Samuel before he knew the Lord, and before the word of the Lord was revealed unto him
footnotes.body_html: Now: or, Thus did Samuel before he knew the Lord, and before the word of the Lord was revealed unto him

verses.text_plain: And the Lord called Samuel again the third time. And he arose and went to Eli, and said, Here am I; for thou didst call me. And Eli perceived that the Lord had called the child.
verses.verse_html: 8And the Lord called Samuel again the third time. And he arose and went to Eli, and said, Here am I; for thou didst call me. And Eli perceived that the Lord had called the child.

verses.text_plain: Therefore Eli said unto Samuel, Go, lie down: and it shall be, if he call thee, that thou shalt say, Speak, Lord; for thy servant heareth. So Samuel went and lay down in his place.
verses.verse_html: 9Therefore Eli said unto Samuel, Go, lie down: and it shall be, if he call thee, that thou shalt say, Speak, Lord; for thy servant heareth. So Samuel went and lay down in his place.

tokens.text: and it shall be, if he call

verses.text_plain: And the Lord came, and stood, and called as at other times, Samuel, Samuel. Then Samuel answered, Speak; for thy servant heareth.
verses.verse_html: 10And the Lord came, and stood, and called as at other times, Samuel, Samuel. Then Samuel answered, Speak; for thy servant heareth.

verses.text_plain: And the Lord said to Samuel, Behold, I will do a thing in Israel, at which both the ears of every one that heareth it shall tingle.
verses.verse_html: 11And the Lord said to Samuel, Behold, I will do a thing in Israel, at which both the ears of every one that heareth it shall tingle.

verses.text_plain: In that day I will perform against Eli all things which I have spoken concerning his house: when I begin, I will also make an end.
verses.verse_html:
12In that day I will perform against Eli all things which I have spoken concerning his house: when I begin, I will also make an end.
 when: Heb. beginning and ending

tokens.text: I will also make an end

footnotes.body_html: when: Heb. beginning and ending

verses.text_plain: For I have told him that I will judge his house for ever for the iniquity which he knoweth; because his sons made themselves vile, and he restrained them not.
verses.verse_html:
13For I have told him that I will judge his house for ever for the iniquity which he knoweth; because his sons made themselves vile, and he restrained them not.
 For I: or, And I will tell him
 ,
 vile: or, accursed
 ,
 restrained: Heb. frowned not upon them

footnotes.body_text: For I: or, And I will tell him
footnotes.body_html: For I: or, And I will tell him

footnotes.body_text: restrained: Heb. frowned not upon them
footnotes.body_html: restrained: Heb. frowned not upon them

verses.text_plain: And therefore I have sworn unto the house of Eli, that the iniquity of Elis house shall not be purged with sacrifice nor offering for ever.
verses.verse_html: 14And therefore I have sworn unto the house of Eli, that the iniquity of Elis house shall not be purged with sacrifice nor offering for ever.

verses.text_plain: And Samuel lay until the morning, and opened the doors of the house of the Lord. And Samuel feared to shew Eli the vision.
verses.verse_html: 15And Samuel lay until the morning, and opened the doors of the house of the Lord. And Samuel feared to shew Eli the vision.

verses.text_plain: Then Eli called Samuel, and said, Samuel, my son. And he answered, Here am I.
verses.verse_html: 16Then Eli called Samuel, and said, Samuel, my son. And he answered, Here am I.

verses.text_plain: And he said, What is the thing that the Lord hath said unto thee? I pray thee hide it not from me: God do so to thee, and more also, if thou hide any thing from me of all the things that he said unto thee.
verses.verse_html:
17And he said, What is the thing that the Lord hath said unto thee? I pray thee hide it not from me: God do so to thee, and more also, if thou hide any thing from me of all the things that he said unto thee.
 more also: Heb. so add
 ,
 thing: or, word

tokens.text: unto thee? I pray thee hide
from me of all the things

footnotes.body_html: more also: Heb. so add

verses.text_plain: And Samuel told him every whit, and hid nothing from him. And he said, It is the Lord: let him do what seemeth him good.
verses.verse_html:
18And Samuel told him every whit, and hid nothing from him. And he said, It is the Lord: let him do what seemeth him good.
 every: Heb. all the things, or, words

tokens.text: nothing from him. And he said

footnotes.body_text: every: Heb. all the things, or, words
footnotes.body_html: every: Heb. all the things, or, words

verses.text_plain: And Samuel grew, and the Lord was with him, and did let none of his words fall to the ground.
verses.verse_html: 19And Samuel grew, and the Lord was with him, and did let none of his words fall to the ground.

tokens.text: was with him, and did let none of his words

verses.text_plain: And all Israel from Dan even to Beersheba knew that Samuel was established to be a prophet of the Lord.
verses.verse_html:
20And all Israel from Dan even to Beersheba knew that Samuel was established to be a prophet of the Lord.
 established: or, faithful

verses.text_plain: And the Lord appeared again in Shiloh: for the Lord revealed himself to Samuel in Shiloh by the word of the Lord.
verses.verse_html: 21And the Lord appeared again in Shiloh: for the Lord revealed himself to Samuel in Shiloh by the word of the Lord.
